author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a joint raid, the sleuths of Organised Crime Intelligence Unit and Narcotics Intelligence Bureau searched a house in Gomathipuram and seized eight kg of ganja and Rs. 51,000. A woman, K. Bakkiyam (54), was arrested in this connection.

The police said that the team led by OCIU Inspector of Police Chockalingam, and NIB Inspector Mahendra Pandian, raided the house at Jubilee Nagar and found the contraband.

The seized materials were handed over to NIB for further investigation.
title: 8 kg ganja seized in a joint raid in Madurai
